Class GymOwnerController

java.lang.Object
com.flipfit.rest.GymOwnerController
@Path("/owner") @Produces("application/json") @Consumes("application/json") public class GymOwnerController extends Object
Controller for gym owner operations. Handles tasks such as managing centers, slots, and viewing bookings for their gyms.
Author:
team IOTA

  • Method Details

    • addGymCenter

      @POST @Path("/centers") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response addGymCenter(@HeaderParam("userId") int userId, GymCenter center)
      Adds a new gym center for the owner.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the gym owner (from header)
      center - GymCenter object containing center details
      Returns:
      Response indicating success (pending approval) or failure

    • updateGymCenter

      @PUT @Path("/centers/{centerId}") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response updateGymCenter(@HeaderParam("userId") int userId, @PathParam("centerId") int centerId, GymCenter center)
      Updates an existing gym center's details.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the gym owner (from header)
      centerId - the ID of the center to update
      center - GymCenter object with updated details
      Returns:
      Response indicating success or failure of update

    • deleteGymCenter

      @DELETE @Path("/centers/{centerId}") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response deleteGymCenter(@HeaderParam("userId") int userId, @PathParam("centerId") int centerId)
      Deletes a gym center.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the gym owner (from header)
      centerId - the ID of the center to delete
      Returns:
      Response indicating success or failure of deletion

    • getMyCenters

      @GET @Path("/centers") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getMyCenters(@HeaderParam("userId") int userId)
      Retrieves all gym centers owned by the owner.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the gym owner (from header)
      Returns:
      Response containing a list of all centers

    • getApprovedCenters

      @GET @Path("/centers/approved") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getApprovedCenters(@HeaderParam("userId") int userId)
      Retrieves approved gym centers owned by the owner.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the gym owner (from header)
      Returns:
      Response containing a list of approved centers

    • getPendingCenters

      @GET @Path("/centers/pending") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getPendingCenters(@HeaderParam("userId") int userId)
      Retrieves centers awaiting approval.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the gym owner (from header)
      Returns:
      Response containing a list of pending centers

    • addSlot

      @POST @Path("/slots") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response addSlot(@HeaderParam("userId") int userId, @QueryParam("centerId") int centerId, @QueryParam("startTime") String startTimeStr, @QueryParam("endTime") String endTimeStr, @QueryParam("totalSeats") int totalSeats)
      Adds a new time slot to a gym center.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the gym owner (from header)
      centerId - the ID of the target gym center
      startTimeStr - start time in HH:mm format
      endTimeStr - end time in HH:mm format
      totalSeats - total capacity for the slot
      Returns:
      Response indicating success or failure of slot addition

    • getMySlots

      @GET @Path("/slots") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getMySlots(@HeaderParam("userId") int userId)
      Retrieves all slots across all centers owned by the owner.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the gym owner (from header)
      Returns:
      Response containing a list of slots

    • deleteSlot

      @DELETE @Path("/slots/{slotId}") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response deleteSlot(@HeaderParam("userId") int userId, @PathParam("slotId") int slotId)
      Deletes a specific slot.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the gym owner (from header)
      slotId - the ID of the slot to delete
      Returns:
      Response indicating success or failure of deletion

    • getBookings

      @GET @Path("/bookings") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getBookings(@HeaderParam("userId") int userId, @QueryParam("centerId") Integer centerId)
      Retrieves bookings for the owner's gyms, optionally filtered by center ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the gym owner (from header)
      centerId - ID of a specific center (optional)
      Returns:
      Response containing a list of bookings

    • getStatistics

      @GET @Path("/statistics") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getStatistics(@HeaderParam("userId") int userId)
      Retrieves overall performance statistics for all gyms owned by the owner.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the gym owner (from header)
      Returns:
      Response containing owner statistics
